text:
@JackPosobiec Children under 18 are not getting #COVID19 🤔

The fairly new and widely used Flublok is not used in people under 18🤔

Will probably someday find out that everyone who died from #coronavirus had this flu vaccine.

Research this and do the math. https://t.co/yr1mcBSSwn
